controller

Interface Controller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckInCheckOutController, EntityController, GuestController, MenuItemController, NavigationController, PersistenceController, ReportController, ReservationController, RoomController, RoomTypeController, ServiceOrderController

    public interface Controller
    Controller is an interface representing a generic contract for all Controller classes.
    Author:
    YingHao

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getOptions()
      Callback method to notify the View of the available options for this controller.
      void onOptionSelected(View view, int option)
      Callback method for View to inform Controller about a selection.

    • Method Detail

      • getOptions

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getOptions()
        Callback method to notify the View of the available options for this controller.
        Returns:
        A list of possible options.

      • onOptionSelected

        void onOptionSelected(View view,
                    int option)
        Callback method for View to inform Controller about a selection.
        Parameters:
        view - - The view instance that triggered this callback.
        option - - The option that is selected, the option value starts from 0.
